Text/Conversations: Bob: "Alice, I'm sorry. I realize now that I'm not as prepared as I should be. Can we reschedule?"
Alice: "Alright, Bob. I'm giving you another chance. Don't disappoint us again."
Contemplate: Bob spends extra hours preparing, earning Alice's trust back.

Text/Conversations: Alice and Bob work out a new schedule. Bob is more prepared, and the project eventually gets back on track.
